15122211111.content:
It was a calm and stary night that all were sleeping under but one infant. A 1 year old boy was awake and looking out at the stars above him and thought of something. He heard that if one makes a wish on a star, the wish would be granted. So young Tommy Pickles decided to make a wish on a star. One that would return him to a place he thought about since Dil was born.

"I wish I would go back to my mommy." Tommy wished.

It didn't happen right away but might soon. For now, he gazed up at the stars for a while longer before drifting to sleep. He dreamt of being back in his mother again and remaining there for the rest of his life. The connection they would have was great and they would be quite popular from that and liked it. But who knows.
15122211111.title: Yes

choices: Tommy grows closer to his mother
Didi feels the need to take him

1512221112.content:
Tommy Pickles enjoyed his life but had an idea. He wanted to go back into his mother to have that kind of adventure. Didi was unaware of what's about to happen but wasn't worried. He brought it up with the others who liked the idea. Though there was one thing they didn't know was that it was practically impossible. But they had gone on 'adventures' that would be impossible for any reason. Then again, it was nice and they like it.

"Why would you want to go back into your mommy?" Chuckie asked.

"I feel like I want to." Tommy asked.

"I doubt that would ever happen." Angelica said.

Tommy wished with all he had to go back into Didi but nothing happened. Angelica was proven right and laughed him off. They didn't know that it had began but would be a while before he was in her. Though there was still a chance he would not go into her. But who knows.

Tommy continued to enjoy the day with the others but knew that this new feeling he had was not sure if it was the wish or not. By lunch, he was wanting his mother. Did felt a similar pull toward him but it wasn't as strong as what Tommy was feeling. He got himself out of the play pin they were in and made his way over to his mother. Didi looked down at him and wondered how he got out.

"There you are, Tommy. Come to see me?" Didi asked.

Tommy nodded and was picked up. Didi held him tight and grew quite nice. They spend the rest of the day together and grew closer and closer. They like it and that reassurance that the wish happened. It was a matter of time of when he goes back into her. Though it would be a while longer before she had in him back in her.

After a stressful day taking care of both boys and the other infants, Didi was glad to have them down for the night. Tommy seems to be acting a bit more strange but what did she expect form an infant. She settled down in bed and read a book for a while before deciding to call it a night. But before falling asleep, she looked out her window and saw a shooting star. Thinking of how Tommy was acting, she decided to make a wish on it.

"I wish Tommy was back in me." Didi said.

After making a wish thinking it may not happen, she pulled her sheets up and fell asleep. She dreamt of having Tommy back in her with Dil and how people would treat her. She would get some great attention and other things but who knows. If the wish happens, then it'll be something she would enjoy. But she'll see in time.
